thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Appian Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Appian Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.11
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Appian Corp:
* APPIAN ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.08
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.11 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 50 PERCENT TO $50.6 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.17 TO $0.18
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.53 TO $0.54
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $198.1 MILLION TO $201.1 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 12 TO 14 PERCENT * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $46 MILLION TO $46.2 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE UP 20 TO 21 PERCENT * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.16, REVENUE VIEW $41.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.11, REVENUE VIEW $45.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.46, REVENUE VIEW $196.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
